content: This soil's full of good stuff, ya can tell. Kinda makes me wish I could be a fig tree, settlin' right in and growin' deep roots here~.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-第一次对话-NPC不是回归NPC-1010云果_特殊反馈

content: {A沉醉闻}This tastes like... <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>? Well mah, I was just gettin' a taste of the air. We've got an oxygen content of 22%. Tastes like it's time to get plantin'~
